mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (cate_no, faq_order, faq_title, faq_content, faq_att_file, faq_writer) VALUES (#{cate_no}, #{faq_order}, #{faq_title}, #{faq_content}, #{faq_att_file}, #{faq_writer})
mapper.sql: SELECT faq_no, cate_no, faq_order, faq_title, faq_content, faq_closing, FAQ.faq_writer, faq_att_file, faq_reg_date, faq_view_cnt FROM FAQ
mapper.update: UPDATE FAQ # faq_writer, faq_admin은 바꾸지 못함 SET cate_no = #{cate_no}, faq_order = #{faq_order}, is_top = #{is_top}, faq_title = #{faq_title}, faq_content = #{faq_content}, faq_closing = #{faq_closing}, faq_att_file = #{faq_att_file}, faq_view_cnt = #{faq_view_cnt}, last_mod_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, last_mod_id = 'admin' WHERE faq_no = #{faq_no}
mapper.select: SELECT c.cate_name FROM FAQ f JOIN FAQ_CATE c ON c.cate_no = f.cate_no WHERE faq_no = #{faq_no};

choose.when: AND (faq_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword},'%') OR faq_content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select:
